text: Soni kulindima kukunswejesyaga Jwalakwe mwakuntogolela, nombenao Achimalaika (akasanswejesyaga) pakun’jogopa, ni akasatumisyaga njasi nikunsala najo jwansachile. Sano ŵanganyao (achimakafili) akusisyana ya Allah (kuti apali kapena pangali kutendaga ali apali), soni Jwalakwe ni Jwaukali nnope pakupeleka ipotesi
